metadata.description: The client Id of azure active directory app/service principal
Specifies the Azure location where the identity will be created.

properties.arguments: [concat('-aadAppClientId', ' ', concat('\"', parameters('aadAppClientId'), '\"'), ' ', '-tenantId', ' ', concat('\"', variables('tenantId'), '\"'), ' ', '-keyVaultName', ' ', concat('\"', parameters('keyVaultName'), '\"'), ' ', '-factoryName', ' ', concat('\"', parameters('factoryName'), '\"'), ' ', '-adfRG', ' ', concat('\"', variables('adfRG'), '\"'))]
properties.scriptContent:
param([string] $aadAppClientId, [string] $tenantId, [string] $keyVaultName, [string] $factoryName, [string] $adfRG)
Install-Module -Name "Az.Accounts" -Force
$secret = Get-AzKeyVaultSecret -VaultName $keyVaultName -Name "aadAppClientSecret" -AsPlainText
$appId = $aadAppClientId
$Credential = New-Object -TypeName System.Management.Automation.PSCredential -ArgumentList $appId, $secret
Connect-AzAccount -Credential $Credential-Tenant $tenantId -ServicePrincipal
Import-Module Az.Resources
Invoke-AzureRmDataFactoryV2Pipeline -ResourceGroupName $adfRG -DataFactoryName $factoryName -PipelineName "NYC_Pipeline"
